Description: Brand New MCKLEIN *AVON 15.6" LEATHER WOMEN'S LADIES BUSINESS BRIEFCASE LAPTOP BAG RED Small front flap pocket with turn lock. Exterior front and back pocket for files. Main compartment provides storage space for files. Padded compartment protects laptops up to 15.6". Interior organizer for pens, business cards, keys, cell phones, and notepads. Padded compartment protects laptops up to 15.6". Leather shoulder straps. Orange, green, blue, and pink cases are trimmed in sand. Protective feet keeps case from falling over.
